comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Like a lot of Bain's NYC photos, this one was apparently taken near their offices on Union Square -- looks like the Everett Building in the background ( en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Everett_Building_%28New_York%29 )

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The issue of alien workers was clearly a hot topic in late 1914. NYT of November 24, 1914 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50714FF3E5E1373... "MAY TEST ALIEN LAW IN CRIMINAL COURT; Utilities Board Will Decide Today on Steps to End Muddle Over Subway Work. CONTRACTS ARE INVOLVED It May Be Urged That in Signing Them Contractors Accepted the Law as It Stands."
